Free-Range Organic Chicken

Free-Range Organic Chicken

Meat and Poultry Category

Description

Savor the difference with our Free-Range Organic Chicken, raised in the fresh air and sunshine of open fields. Our chickens enjoy a natural lifestyle, foraging for their food in a stress-free environment, which contributes to the superior taste and texture of the meat. They are fed a diet free from genetically modified organisms (GMOs), antibiotics, and synthetic pesticides, aligning with our commitment to ethical and sustainable farming practices. This approach not only benefits the welfare of the chickens but also ensures a healthier and cleaner product for you. Each bird is processed with the utmost care, resulting in chicken that is not only juicy and flavorful but also rich in essential nutrients.

Specifications

  • Weight: Approximately 3-4 lbs per whole chicken
  • Size: Full-sized, ready to cook
  • Packaging: Biodegradable packaging
  • Nutritional Information: High in protein, low in fat, contains essential vitamins and minerals

Benefits

  • Supports Animal Welfare

    Raised in a humane, stress-free environment.

  • Healthier Option

    Lower in fat and higher in omega-3 fatty acids.

  • Superior Taste and Texture

    Noticeably juicier and more flavorful meat.
